abstract: Michigan Judge Dennis M Wiley vacated 19-year-old Zachery Anderson's sentence of fourth-degree criminal sexual conduct and 25 years on sex offender registry for consensual sex with a minor; different judge will be appointed to re-sentence teen.
lead_paragraph: A judge has vacated the sentence of Zachery Anderson, whose arrest on a charge of having sex with a 14-year-old girl when he was 19 prompted a call to change sex offender registries.

headline.main: Michigan: New Sentencing for Teenager in Sex Crime
headline.print_headline: Michigan: New Sentencing for Teenager in Sex Crime

snippet: A judge has vacated the sentence of Zachery Anderson, whose arrest on a charge of having sex with a 14-year-old girl when he was 19 prompted a call to change sex offender registries.
